Preacher of the Prophet's Mosque: The remembrance of God strengthens the spirit and helps worship and prohibits taboos
01 Nov 2019, 13:00 by editor20
Citizen - SPA
The Imam and the preacher of the Prophet's Mosque, Sheikh Ali bin Abdulrahman Al-Hudhaifi, spoke about the virtue of mentioning Allah Almighty, recommending Muslims to the piety of Allah Azogel. He said in his Friday sermon: God has called upon you in the name of faith, the greatest attribute of man to beg him in favor of business and save it from invalidation. He said, "O ye who believe! Fear Allah, and seek Him the means, and strive in his way, and all your tidings may be done to you, and to all of you." The whole of the good and the reward of the penalties and the most comprehensive ways of good, and the fortress of the Almobakat is the remembrance of God Almighty, it completes the duties and duties and forces the lack of worship, and maximizes the reward of good deeds and erased by the bad, and enough reward and virtue and great honor and light and good that God imposed in prayer Hajj and in many obedience and urged by Shara in all cases.
